ygData.subject: For those who play in servers other than Innoruuk
ygData.msgSnippet: From EQV: Akesia, a Verant employee who appeared on the Quellious chat channel today at 1:45 pm PST while the server was down, stated that there will be a
ygData.messageBody:
From EQV:
Akesia, a Verant employee who appeared on the Quellious chat channel today
at 1:45 pm PST while the server was down, stated that there will be a quest
that will allow players to move characters from one server to another. When
asked to confirm this, she repeated "Yes, it will be a quest."

Anyway I foresee it must be a damn difficult quest to switch server, maybe
with a group of full-house lvl 50s? ;)

Ziltus

p/s: Hope sereph won't sqeeze his balls after reading this, hehe.
